page.title: 05Just Another Day:10 June 85
page.content: I was late. I got dressed, went to the bathroom, then ate some cereal. I went to school at 9.00 am. I did PE then helped Babita lay out the musical instruments for assembly. After play I made my model for the Great Air Race. This is a science competition which our school has entered. We have to make a model from one polystyrene tile and one balloon. The model that travels the farthest wins. I went home and had fish and chips for dinner. School started at 1.30 pm. I worked on my model again. Then the boys watched a video on sex education. We went home at 3.30 pm. I read my library book at home. I went to the Mosque with my cousins until 6.00 pm. I played marbles with Philip, then watched TV and had some food. Most of my family were not eating because they were fasting for Ramadan. I went to bed.
